original_text: But the Bible speaks also about another way. It shows how to become right with God because you trust him. It says: ‘Do not say to yourself, “Someone will have to go up into heaven.” ’ (That means: ‘Someone will have to bring Christ down from up there.’)
korean_text: 믿음으로 말미암는 의는 이같이 말하되 네 마음에 누가 하늘에 올라가겠느냐 하지 말라 하니 올라가겠느냐 함은 그리스도를 모셔 내리려는 것이요

sentences.original_text: But the Bible speaks also about another way
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 성경은 또 다른 길에 대해서도 말합니다

sentences.original_text: It shows how to become right with God
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 어떻게 하나님과 올바른 관계를 맺을 수 있는지 보여줍니다

sentences.original_text: "Someone will have to go up into heaven."'
'Someone will have to bring Christ down
